3.2.3-beta.1.readme: ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/language-react-red.svg) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-000000.svg) [![NPM Package](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/bizcharts.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/bizcharts) [![NPM Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/bizcharts.svg)](https://npmjs.org/package/bizcharts) # BizCharts New charting and visualization library has been released: http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts. Please move to it and we won't maintain the old version soon. [More details about BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/index) ## Features - React es6 grammar - Easy to use - Strong expansion capability - Support most data visualization charts [see more demos](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/demo) ## Installation ### npm ```sh $ npm install bizcharts ``` ### umd ```html ``` ### dev build ```sh $ git clone https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts.git $ cd BizCharts $ npm install $ npm run build ``` ### dev demo ```sh $ sudo vi /etc/hosts // add 127.0.0.1 localhost $ npm run[-script] demo // open in browser http://localhost:3510/ ``` ## Usage ```jsx import {Chart, Axis, Tooltip, Geom} from "bizcharts"; const data = [...]; `${val}°C`}} /> ``` ## Document ### tutorial - [quick start](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/start) - [chart introduce](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/chart) - [chart type](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/chartType) - [data](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/data) - [DataSet](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/dataset) - [dataflow](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/dataflow) - [theme](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/theme) - [interaction](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/interaction) - [animation](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/animate) ### api - [BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/bizcharts) - components - [Chart](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/chart) - [Coord](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/coord) - [Axis](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/axis) - [Geom](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/geom) - [Label](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/label) - [Legend](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/legend) - [Tooltip](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/tooltip) - [Guide](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/guide) - [Facet](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/facet) - [View](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/view) - Plugin - [Slider](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/sliderPlugin) - others - [scale](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/scale) - [shape](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/shape) - [dataset](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/dataset) - [connector](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/connector) - [transform](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/transform) - [theme](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/theme) ### [FAQ](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/qa) ### How to Contribute We welcome all contributions. You could submit any ideas as pull requests. Thank you for your interest and have a good time. Please let us know how can we help. Do check out [issues](https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts/issues) for bug reports or suggestions first. ### License BizCharts is available under the License MIT.

3.2.5-beta.2.name: bizcharts
3.2.5-beta.2.description: A powerful React chart library based G2 for browser

scripts.build: npm run build-cjs && npm run build-es6 && rimraf umd && npm run build-umd && npm run build-min && npm run build-animate

3.2.5-beta.2.readme: ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/language-react-red.svg) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-000000.svg) [![NPM Package](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/bizcharts.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/bizcharts) [![NPM Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/bizcharts.svg)](https://npmjs.org/package/bizcharts) # BizCharts New charting and visualization library has been released: http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts. Please move to it and we won't maintain the old version soon. [More details about BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/index) ## Features - React es6 grammar - Easy to use - Strong expansion capability - Support most data visualization charts [see more demos](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/demo) ## Installation ### npm ```sh $ npm install bizcharts ``` ### umd ```html ``` ### dev build ```sh $ git clone https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts.git $ cd BizCharts $ npm install $ npm run build ``` ### dev demo ```sh $ sudo vi /etc/hosts // add 127.0.0.1 localhost $ npm run[-script] demo // open in browser http://localhost:3510/ ``` ## Usage ```jsx import {Chart, Axis, Tooltip, Geom} from "bizcharts"; const data = [...]; `${val}°C`}} /> ``` ## Document ### tutorial - [quick start](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/start) - [chart introduce](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/chart) - [chart type](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/chartType) - [data](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/data) - [DataSet](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/dataset) - [dataflow](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/dataflow) - [theme](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/theme) - [interaction](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/interaction) - [animation](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/animate) ### api - [BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/bizcharts) - components - [Chart](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/chart) - [Coord](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/coord) - [Axis](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/axis) - [Geom](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/geom) - [Label](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/label) - [Legend](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/legend) - [Tooltip](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/tooltip) - [Guide](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/guide) - [Facet](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/facet) - [View](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/view) - Plugin - [Slider](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/sliderPlugin) - others - [scale](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/scale) - [shape](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/shape) - [dataset](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/dataset) - [connector](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/connector) - [transform](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/transform) - [theme](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/theme) ### [FAQ](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/qa) ### How to Contribute We welcome all contributions. You could submit any ideas as pull requests. Thank you for your interest and have a good time. Please let us know how can we help. Do check out [issues](https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts/issues) for bug reports or suggestions first. ### License BizCharts is available under the License MIT.

3.4.1-beta.0.description: A powerful React chart library based G2 for browser

3.4.1-beta.0.readme: ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/language-react-red.svg) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-000000.svg) [![NPM Package](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/bizcharts.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/bizcharts) [![NPM Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/bizcharts.svg)](https://npmjs.org/package/bizcharts) # BizCharts New charting and visualization library has been released: http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts. Please move to it and we won't maintain the old version soon. [More details about BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/index) ## Features - React es6 grammar - Easy to use - Strong expansion capability - Support most data visualization charts [see more demos](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/demo) ## Installation ### npm ```sh $ npm install bizcharts ``` ### umd ```html ``` ### dev build ```sh $ git clone https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts.git $ cd BizCharts $ npm install $ npm run build ``` ### dev demo ```sh $ sudo vi /etc/hosts // add 127.0.0.1 localhost $ npm run[-script] demo // open in browser http://localhost:3510/ ``` ## Usage ```jsx import {Chart, Axis, Tooltip, Geom} from "bizcharts"; const data = [...]; `${val}°C`}} /> ``` ## Document ### tutorial - [quick start](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/start) - [chart introduce](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/chart) - [chart type](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/chartType) - [data](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/data) - [DataSet](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/dataset) - [dataflow](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/dataflow) - [theme](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/theme) - [interaction](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/interaction) - [animation](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/animate) ### api - [BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/bizcharts) - components - [Chart](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/chart) - [Coord](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/coord) - [Axis](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/axis) - [Geom](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/geom) - [Label](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/label) - [Legend](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/legend) - [Tooltip](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/tooltip) - [Guide](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/guide) - [Facet](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/facet) - [View](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/view) - Plugin - [Slider](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/sliderPlugin) - others - [scale](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/scale) - [shape](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/shape) - [dataset](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/dataset) - [connector](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/connector) - [transform](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/transform) - [theme](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/theme) ### [FAQ](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/qa) ### How to Contribute We welcome all contributions. You could submit any ideas as pull requests. Thank you for your interest and have a good time. Please let us know how can we help. Do check out [issues](https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts/issues) for bug reports or suggestions first. ### License BizCharts is available under the License MIT.

const data = [...]; `${val}°C`}} /> ``` ## Document ### tutorial - [quick start](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/start) - [chart introduce](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/chart) - [chart type](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/chartType) - [data](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/data) - [DataSet](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/dataset) - [dataflow](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/dataflow) - [theme](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/theme) - [interaction](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/interaction) - [animation](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/animate) ### api - [BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/bizcharts) - components - [Chart](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/chart) - [Coord](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/coord) - [Axis](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/axis) - [Geom](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/geom) - [Label](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/label) - [Legend](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/legend) - [Tooltip](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/tooltip) - [Guide](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/guide) - [Facet](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/facet) - [View](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/view) - Plugin - [Slider](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/sliderPlugin) - others - [scale](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/scale) - [shape](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/shape) - [dataset](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/dataset) - [connector](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/connector) - [transform](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/transform) - [theme](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/theme) ### [FAQ](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/qa) ### How to Contribute We welcome all contributions. You could submit any ideas as pull requests. Thank you for your interest and have a good time. Please let us know how can we help. Do check out [issues](https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts/issues) for bug reports or suggestions first. ### Experience improvement plan description ~~In order to better service to users, and G2 will monitoring, such as URL information is sent back to AntV server, BizCharts did not close the request: https://kcart.alipay.com/web/bi.do~~ ~~No other information is collected except the URL and G2 version information, all in order to have a better understanding of how G2 works and better serve users. If you are worried, you can close it by the following code:~~ ``` // close G2 experience improvement plan dot request (such as server-side rendering) BizCharts.Track (false); ``` #### update: G2 decided to terminate the "Experience Improvement Program". In verson @antv/g2@3.4.7（released at 2018.12.26） and above, all tracking code is removed, no unexpected remote request will be sent while you are using G2. And Bizcharts Upgrade the dependent version the first time at 2018.12.26 24:00. ### License BizCharts is available under the License MIT.

3.4.5-beta.0.readme: # BizCharts [![](https://img.shields.io/travis/alibaba/BiaCharts.svg)](https://travis-ci.com/alibaba/BizCharts) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/language-react-red.svg) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-000000.svg) [![NPM Package](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/bizcharts.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/bizcharts) [![NPM Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/bizcharts.svg)](https://npmjs.org/package/bizcharts) New charting and visualization library has been released: http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts. Please move to it and we won't maintain the old version soon. [More details about BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/index) ## Features - React es6 grammar - Easy to use - Strong expansion capability - Support most data visualization charts [see more demos](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/demo) ## Installation ### npm ```sh $ npm install bizcharts ``` ### umd ```html ``` ### dev build ```sh $ git clone https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts.git $ cd BizCharts $ npm install $ npm run build ``` ### dev demo ```sh $ sudo vi /etc/hosts // add 127.0.0.1 localhost $ npm run[-script] demo // open in browser http://localhost:3510/ ``` ## Usage ```jsx import {Chart, Axis, Tooltip, Geom} from "bizcharts"; const data = [...]; `${val}°C`}} /> ``` ## Document ### tutorial - [quick start](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/start) - [chart introduce](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/chart) - [chart type](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/chartType) - [data](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/data) - [DataSet](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/dataset) - [dataflow](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/dataflow) - [theme](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/theme) - [interaction](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/interaction) - [animation](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/animate) ### api - [BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/bizcharts) - components - [Chart](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/chart) - [Coord](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/coord) - [Axis](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/axis) - [Geom](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/geom) - [Label](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/label) - [Legend](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/legend) - [Tooltip](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/tooltip) - [Guide](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/guide) - [Facet](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/facet) - [View](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/view) - Plugin - [Slider](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/sliderPlugin) - others - [scale](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/scale) - [shape](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/shape) - [dataset](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/dataset) - [connector](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/connector) - [transform](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/transform) - [theme](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/theme) ### [FAQ](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/qa) ### How to Contribute We welcome all contributions. You could submit any ideas as pull requests. Thank you for your interest and have a good time. Please let us know how can we help. Do check out [issues](https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts/issues) for bug reports or suggestions first. ### Experience improvement plan description ~~In order to better service to users, and G2 will monitoring, such as URL information is sent back to AntV server, BizCharts did not close the request: https://kcart.alipay.com/web/bi.do~~ ~~No other information is collected except the URL and G2 version information, all in order to have a better understanding of how G2 works and better serve users. If you are worried, you can close it by the following code:~~ ``` // close G2 experience improvement plan dot request (such as server-side rendering) BizCharts.Track (false); ``` #### update: G2 decided to terminate the "Experience Improvement Program". In verson @antv/g2@3.4.7（released at 2018.12.26） and above, all tracking code is removed, no unexpected remote request will be sent while you are using G2. And Bizcharts Upgrade the dependent version the first time at 2018.12.26 24:00. ### License BizCharts is available under the License MIT.

const data = [...]; `${val}°C`}} /> ``` ## Document ### tutorial - [quick start](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/start) - [chart introduce](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/chart) - [chart type](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/chartType) - [data](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/data) - [DataSet](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/dataset) - [dataflow](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/dataflow) - [theme](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/theme) - [interaction](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/interaction) - [animation](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/animate) ### api - [BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/bizcharts) - components - [Chart](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/chart) - [Coord](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/coord) - [Axis](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/axis) - [Geom](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/geom) - [Label](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/label) - [Legend](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/legend) - [Tooltip](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/tooltip) - [Guide](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/guide) - [Facet](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/facet) - [View](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/view) - Plugin - [Slider](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/sliderPlugin) - others - [scale](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/scale) - [shape](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/shape) - [dataset](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/dataset) - [connector](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/connector) - [transform](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/transform) - [theme](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/theme) ### [FAQ](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/qa) ### How to Contribute We welcome all contributions. You could submit any ideas as pull requests. Thank you for your interest and have a good time. Please let us know how can we help. Do check out [issues](https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts/issues) for bug reports or suggestions first. ### Experience improvement plan description ~~In order to better service to users, and G2 will monitoring, such as URL information is sent back to AntV server, BizCharts did not close the request: https://kcart.alipay.com/web/bi.do~~ ~~No other information is collected except the URL and G2 version information, all in order to have a better understanding of how G2 works and better serve users. If you are worried, you can close it by the following code:~~ ``` // close G2 experience improvement plan dot request (such as server-side rendering) BizCharts.Track (false); ``` #### update: G2 decided to terminate the "Experience Improvement Program". In verson @antv/g2@3.4.7（released at 2018.12.26） and above, all tracking code is removed, no unexpected remote request will be sent while you are using G2. And Bizcharts Upgrade the dependent version the first time at 2018.12.26 24:00. ### License BizCharts is available under the License MIT.

3.5.2-beta.2.readme: # BizCharts [![](https://img.shields.io/travis/alibaba/BiaCharts.svg)](https://travis-ci.com/alibaba/BizCharts) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/language-react-red.svg) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-000000.svg) [![NPM Package](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/bizcharts.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/bizcharts) [![NPM Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/bizcharts.svg)](https://npmjs.org/package/bizcharts) New charting and visualization library has been released: http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts. Please move to it and we won't maintain the old version soon. [More details about BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/index) ## Features - React es6 grammar - Easy to use - Strong expansion capability - Support most data visualization charts [see more demos](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/demo) ## Installation ### npm ```sh $ npm install bizcharts ``` ### umd ```html ``` ### dev build ```sh $ git clone https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts.git $ cd BizCharts $ npm install $ npm run build ``` ### dev demo ```sh $ sudo vi /etc/hosts // add 127.0.0.1 localhost $ npm run[-script] demo // open in browser http://localhost:3510/ ``` ## Usage ```jsx import {Chart, Axis, Tooltip, Geom} from "bizcharts"; const data = [...]; `${val}°C`}} /> ``` ## Document ### tutorial - [quick start](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/start) - [chart introduce](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/chart) - [chart type](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/chartType) - [data](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/data) - [DataSet](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/dataset) - [dataflow](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/dataflow) - [theme](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/theme) - [interaction](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/interaction) - [animation](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/animate) ### api - [BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/bizcharts) - components - [Chart](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/chart) - [Coord](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/coord) - [Axis](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/axis) - [Geom](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/geom) - [Label](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/label) - [Legend](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/legend) - [Tooltip](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/tooltip) - [Guide](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/guide) - [Facet](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/facet) - [View](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/view) - Plugin - [Slider](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/sliderPlugin) - others - [scale](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/scale) - [shape](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/shape) - [dataset](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/dataset) - [connector](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/connector) - [transform](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/transform) - [theme](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/theme) ### [FAQ](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/qa) ### How to Contribute We welcome all contributions. You could submit any ideas as pull requests. Thank you for your interest and have a good time. Please let us know how can we help. Do check out [issues](https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts/issues) for bug reports or suggestions first. ### Experience improvement plan description ~~In order to better service to users, and G2 will monitoring, such as URL information is sent back to AntV server, BizCharts did not close the request: https://kcart.alipay.com/web/bi.do~~ ~~No other information is collected except the URL and G2 version information, all in order to have a better understanding of how G2 works and better serve users. If you are worried, you can close it by the following code:~~ ``` // close G2 experience improvement plan dot request (such as server-side rendering) BizCharts.Track (false); ``` #### update: G2 decided to terminate the "Experience Improvement Program". In verson @antv/g2@3.4.7（released at 2018.12.26） and above, all tracking code is removed, no unexpected remote request will be sent while you are using G2. And Bizcharts Upgrade the dependent version the first time at 2018.12.26 24:00. ### License BizCharts is available under the License MIT.

3.5.6-beta.1.name: bizcharts
3.5.6-beta.1.description: A powerful React chart library based G2 for browser

scripts.build: npm run build-cjs && npm run build-es6 && rimraf umd && npm run build-umd && npm run build-min && npm run build-animate
scripts.test: cross-env BABEL_ENV=test NODE_ENV=test karma start test/karma.conf.js
scripts.test:pre: cross-env BABEL_ENV=test NODE_ENV=testPre karma start test/karma.conf.js --single-run

3.5.6-beta.1.readme: # BizCharts [![](https://img.shields.io/travis/alibaba/BiaCharts.svg)](https://travis-ci.com/alibaba/BizCharts) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/language-react-red.svg) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-000000.svg) [![NPM Package](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/bizcharts.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/bizcharts) [![NPM Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/bizcharts.svg)](https://npmjs.org/package/bizcharts) New charting and visualization library has been released: http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts. Please move to it and we won't maintain the old version soon. [More details about BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/index) ## Features - React es6 grammar - Easy to use - Strong expansion capability - Support most data visualization charts [see more demos](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/demo) ## Installation ### npm ```sh $ npm install bizcharts ``` ### umd ```html ``` ### dev build ```sh $ git clone https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts.git $ cd BizCharts $ npm install $ npm run build ``` ### dev demo ```sh $ sudo vi /etc/hosts // add 127.0.0.1 localhost $ npm run[-script] demo // open in browser http://localhost:3510/ ``` ## Usage ```jsx import {Chart, Axis, Tooltip, Geom} from "bizcharts"; const data = [...]; `${val}°C`}} /> ``` ## Document ### tutorial - [quick start](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/start) - [chart introduce](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/chart) - [chart type](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/chartType) - [data](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/data) - [DataSet](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/dataset) - [dataflow](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/dataflow) - [theme](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/theme) - [interaction](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/interaction) - [animation](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/animate) ### api - [BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/bizcharts) - components - [Chart](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/chart) - [Coord](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/coord) - [Axis](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/axis) - [Geom](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/geom) - [Label](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/label) - [Legend](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/legend) - [Tooltip](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/tooltip) - [Guide](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/guide) - [Facet](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/facet) - [View](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/view) - Plugin - [Slider](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/sliderPlugin) - others - [scale](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/scale) - [shape](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/shape) - [dataset](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/dataset) - [connector](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/connector) - [transform](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/transform) - [theme](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/theme) ### [FAQ](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/qa) ### How to Contribute We welcome all contributions. You could submit any ideas as pull requests. Thank you for your interest and have a good time. Please let us know how can we help. Do check out [issues](https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts/issues) for bug reports or suggestions first. ### Experience improvement plan description ~~In order to better service to users, and G2 will monitoring, such as URL information is sent back to AntV server, BizCharts did not close the request: https://kcart.alipay.com/web/bi.do~~ ~~No other information is collected except the URL and G2 version information, all in order to have a better understanding of how G2 works and better serve users. If you are worried, you can close it by the following code:~~ ``` // close G2 experience improvement plan dot request (such as server-side rendering) BizCharts.Track (false); ``` #### update: G2 decided to terminate the "Experience Improvement Program". In verson @antv/g2@3.4.7（released at 2018.12.26） and above, all tracking code is removed, no unexpected remote request will be sent while you are using G2. And Bizcharts Upgrade the dependent version the first time at 2018.12.26 24:00. ### License BizCharts is available under the License MIT.

Please move to it and we won't maintain the old version soon. [More details about BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/index) ## Features - React es6 grammar - Easy to use - Strong expansion capability - Support most data visualization charts [see more demos](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/demo) ## Installation ### npm ```sh $ npm install bizcharts ``` ### umd ```html ``` ### dev build ```sh $ git clone https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts.git $ cd BizCharts $ npm install $ npm run build ``` ### dev demo ```sh $ sudo vi /etc/hosts // add 127.0.0.1 localhost $ npm run[-script] demo // open in browser http://localhost:3510/ ``` ## Usage ```jsx import {Chart, Axis, Tooltip, Geom} from "bizcharts"; const data = [...]; `${val}°C`}} /> ``` ## Document ### tutorial - [quick start](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/start) - [chart introduce](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/chart) - [chart type](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/chartType) - [data](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/data) - [DataSet](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/dataset) - [dataflow](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/dataflow) - [theme](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/theme) - [interaction](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/interaction) - [animation](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/animate) ### api - [BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/bizcharts) - components - [Chart](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/chart) - [Coord](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/coord) - [Axis](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/axis) - [Geom](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/geom) - [Label](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/label) - [Legend](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/legend) - [Tooltip](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/tooltip) - [Guide](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/guide) - [Facet](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/facet) - [View](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/view) - Plugin - [Slider](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/sliderPlugin) - others - [scale](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/scale) - [shape](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/shape) - [dataset](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/dataset) - [connector](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/connector) - [transform](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/transform) - [theme](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/theme) ### [FAQ](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/qa) ### How to Contribute We welcome all contributions. You could submit any ideas as pull requests. Thank you for your interest and have a good time. Please let us know how can we help. Do check out [issues](https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts/issues) for bug reports or suggestions first. ### Experience improvement plan description ~~In order to better service to users, and G2 will monitoring, such as URL information is sent back to AntV server, BizCharts did not close the request: https://kcart.alipay.com/web/bi.do~~ ~~No other information is collected except the URL and G2 version information, all in order to have a better understanding of how G2 works and better serve users. If you are worried, you can close it by the following code:~~ ``` // close G2 experience improvement plan dot request (such as server-side rendering) BizCharts.Track (false); ``` #### update: G2 decided to terminate the "Experience Improvement Program". In verson @antv/g2@3.4.7（released at 2018.12.26） and above, all tracking code is removed, no unexpected remote request will be sent while you are using G2. And Bizcharts Upgrade the dependent version the first time at 2018.12.26 24:00. ### License BizCharts is available under the License MIT.

[More details about BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/index) ## Features - React es6 grammar - Easy to use - Strong expansion capability - Support most data visualization charts [see more demos](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/demo) ## Installation ### npm ```sh $ npm install bizcharts ``` ### umd ```html ``` ### dev build ```sh $ git clone https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts.git $ cd BizCharts $ npm install $ npm run build ``` ### dev demo ```sh $ sudo vi /etc/hosts // add 127.0.0.1 localhost $ npm run[-script] demo // open in browser http://localhost:3510/ ``` ## Usage ```jsx import {Chart, Axis, Tooltip, Geom} from "bizcharts"; 3.5.7-beta.1.readme: # BizCharts [![](https://img.shields.io/travis/alibaba/BiaCharts.svg)](https://travis-ci.com/alibaba/BizCharts) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/language-react-red.svg) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-000000.svg) [![NPM Package](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/bizcharts.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/bizcharts) [![NPM Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/bizcharts.svg)](https://npmjs.org/package/bizcharts) New charting and visualization library has been released: http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts. Please move to it and we won't maintain the old version soon. [More details about BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/index) ## Features - React es6 grammar - Easy to use - Strong expansion capability - Support most data visualization charts [see more demos](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/demo) ## Installation ### npm ```sh $ npm install bizcharts ``` ### umd ```html ``` ### dev build ```sh $ git clone https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts.git $ cd BizCharts $ npm install $ npm run build ``` ### dev demo ```sh $ sudo vi /etc/hosts // add 127.0.0.1 localhost $ npm run[-script] demo // open in browser http://localhost:3510/ ``` ## Usage ```jsx import {Chart, Axis, Tooltip, Geom} from "bizcharts"; const data = [...]; `${val}°C`}} /> ``` ## Document ### tutorial - [quick start](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/start) - [chart introduce](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/chart) - [chart type](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/chartType) - [data](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/data) - [DataSet](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/dataset) - [dataflow](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/dataflow) - [theme](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/theme) - [interaction](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/interaction) - [animation](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/animate) ### api - [BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/bizcharts) - components - [Chart](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/chart) - [Coord](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/coord) - [Axis](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/axis) - [Geom](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/geom) - [Label](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/label) - [Legend](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/legend) - [Tooltip](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/tooltip) - [Guide](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/guide) - [Facet](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/facet) - [View](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/view) - Plugin - [Slider](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/sliderPlugin) - others - [scale](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/scale) - [shape](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/shape) - [dataset](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/dataset) - [connector](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/connector) - [transform](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/transform) - [theme](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/theme) ### [FAQ](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/qa) ### How to Contribute We welcome all contributions. You could submit any ideas as pull requests. Thank you for your interest and have a good time. Please let us know how can we help. Do check out [issues](https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts/issues) for bug reports or suggestions first. ### Experience improvement plan description ~~In order to better service to users, and G2 will monitoring, such as URL information is sent back to AntV server, BizCharts did not close the request: https://kcart.alipay.com/web/bi.do~~ ~~No other information is collected except the URL and G2 version information, all in order to have a better understanding of how G2 works and better serve users. If you are worried, you can close it by the following code:~~ ``` // close G2 experience improvement plan dot request (such as server-side rendering) BizCharts.Track (false); ``` #### update: G2 decided to terminate the "Experience Improvement Program". In verson @antv/g2@3.4.7（released at 2018.12.26） and above, all tracking code is removed, no unexpected remote request will be sent while you are using G2. And Bizcharts Upgrade the dependent version the first time at 2018.12.26 24:00. ### License BizCharts is available under the License MIT.

3.5.8-beta.0.readme: # BizCharts [![](https://img.shields.io/travis/alibaba/BiaCharts.svg)](https://travis-ci.com/alibaba/BizCharts) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/language-react-red.svg) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-000000.svg) [![NPM Package](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/bizcharts.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/bizcharts) [![NPM Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/bizcharts.svg)](https://npmjs.org/package/bizcharts) New charting and visualization library has been released: http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts. Please move to it and we won't maintain the old version soon. [More details about BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/index) ## Features - React es6 grammar - Easy to use - Strong expansion capability - Support most data visualization charts [see more demos](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/demo) ## Installation ### npm ```sh $ npm install bizcharts ``` ### umd ```html ``` ### dev build ```sh $ git clone https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts.git $ cd BizCharts $ npm install $ npm run build ``` ### dev demo ```sh $ sudo vi /etc/hosts // add 127.0.0.1 localhost $ npm run[-script] demo // open in browser http://localhost:3510/ ``` ## Usage ```jsx import {Chart, Axis, Tooltip, Geom} from "bizcharts"; const data = [...]; `${val}°C`}} /> ``` ## Document ### tutorial - [quick start](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/start) - [chart introduce](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/chart) - [chart type](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/chartType) - [data](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/data) - [DataSet](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/dataset) - [dataflow](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/dataflow) - [theme](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/theme) - [interaction](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/interaction) - [animation](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/animate) ### api - [BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/bizcharts) - components - [Chart](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/chart) - [Coord](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/coord) - [Axis](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/axis) - [Geom](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/geom) - [Label](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/label) - [Legend](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/legend) - [Tooltip](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/tooltip) - [Guide](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/guide) - [Facet](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/facet) - [View](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/view) - Plugin - [Slider](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/sliderPlugin) - others - [scale](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/scale) - [shape](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/shape) - [dataset](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/dataset) - [connector](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/connector) - [transform](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/transform) - [theme](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/theme) ### [FAQ](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/qa) ### How to Contribute We welcome all contributions. You could submit any ideas as pull requests. Thank you for your interest and have a good time. Please let us know how can we help. ```

3.5.9-beta.0.name: bizcharts
3.5.9-beta.0.description: A powerful React chart library based G2 for browser

scripts.build: npm run build-cjs && npm run build-es6 && rimraf umd && npm run build-umd && npm run build-min && npm run build-animate

3.5.9-beta.0.readme: # BizCharts [![](https://img.shields.io/travis/alibaba/BiaCharts.svg)](https://travis-ci.com/alibaba/BizCharts) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/language-react-red.svg) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-000000.svg) [![NPM Package](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/bizcharts.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/bizcharts) [![NPM Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/bizcharts.svg)](https://npmjs.org/package/bizcharts) New charting and visualization library has been released: http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts. Please move to it and we won't maintain the old version soon. [More details about BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/index) ## Features - React es6 grammar - Easy to use - Strong expansion capability - Support most data visualization charts [see more demos](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/demo) ## Installation ### npm ```sh $ npm install bizcharts ``` ### umd ```html ``` ### dev build ```sh $ git clone https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts.git $ cd BizCharts $ npm install $ npm run build ``` ### dev demo ```sh $ sudo vi /etc/hosts // add 127.0.0.1 localhost $ npm run[-script] demo // open in browser http://localhost:3510/ ``` ## Usage ```jsx import {Chart, Axis, Tooltip, Geom} from "bizcharts"; 4.0.5-beta.0.readme: # BizCharts [![](https://img.shields.io/travis/alibaba/BiaCharts.svg)](https://travis-ci.com/alibaba/BizCharts) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/language-react-red.svg) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-000000.svg) [![NPM Package](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/bizcharts.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/bizcharts) [![NPM Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/bizcharts.svg)](https://npmjs.org/package/bizcharts) New charting and visualization library has been released: http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts. [More details about BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/index) ## Features - React es6 grammar - Easy to use - Strong expansion capability - Support most data visualization charts [see more demos](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/demo) ## Releases - v3.5.x: https://bizcharts.net/product/bizcharts/gallery - V4.0.0: https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/gallery 升级文档： https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/category/61/page/104 ## Installation ### npm ```sh $ npm install bizcharts ``` ### umd ```html ``` ### dev build ```sh $ git clone https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts.git $ cd BizCharts $ npm install $ npm start $ npm run build ``` ### test snapshot 在不支持外网测试 ``` tnpm run uitest ``` ## Usage [试一试](https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/demo/305) ```jsx import {Chart, Axis, Tooltip, Line, Point} from "bizcharts"; const data = [...]; `${val}°C`}} /> ``` ### [FAQ](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/qa) ### How to Contribute We welcome all contributions. You could submit any ideas as pull requests. Thank you for your interest and have a good time. Please let us know how can we help. Do check out [issues](https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts/issues) for bug reports or suggestions first. #### update: G2 decided to terminate the "Experience Improvement Program". In verson @antv/g2@3.4.7（released at 2018.12.26） and above, all tracking code is removed, no unexpected remote request will be sent while you are using G2. And Bizcharts Upgrade the dependent version the first time at 2018.12.26 24:00. ### License BizCharts is available under the License MIT.

4.0.10-beta.0.readme: # BizCharts [![](https://img.shields.io/travis/alibaba/BiaCharts.svg)](https://travis-ci.com/alibaba/BizCharts) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/language-react-red.svg) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-000000.svg) [![NPM Package](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/bizcharts.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/bizcharts) [![NPM Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/bizcharts.svg)](https://npmjs.org/package/bizcharts) New charting and visualization library has been released: http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts. [More details about BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/index) ## Features - React es6 grammar - Easy to use - Strong expansion capability - Support most data visualization charts [see more demos](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/demo) ## Releases - v3.5.x: https://bizcharts.net/product/bizcharts/gallery - V4.0.0: https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/gallery 升级文档： https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/category/61/page/104 ## Installation ### npm ```sh $ npm install bizcharts ``` ### umd ```html ``` ### dev build ```sh $ git clone https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts.git $ cd BizCharts $ npm install $ npm start $ npm run build ``` ### test snapshot 在不支持外网测试 ``` tnpm run uitest ``` ## Usage [试一试](https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/demo/305) ```jsx import {Chart, Axis, Tooltip, Line, Point} from "bizcharts"; const data = [...]; `${val}°C`}} /> ``` ### [FAQ](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/qa) ### How to Contribute We welcome all contributions. You could submit any ideas as pull requests. Thank you for your interest and have a good time. Please let us know how can we help. Do check out [issues](https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts/issues) for bug reports or suggestions first. #### update: G2 decided to terminate the "Experience Improvement Program". In verson @antv/g2@3.4.7（released at 2018.12.26） and above, all tracking code is removed, no unexpected remote request will be sent while you are using G2. And Bizcharts Upgrade the dependent version the first time at 2018.12.26 24:00. ### License BizCharts is available under the License MIT.

4.0.12-beta.1.readme: # BizCharts [![](https://img.shields.io/travis/alibaba/BiaCharts.svg)](https://travis-ci.com/alibaba/BizCharts) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/language-react-red.svg) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-000000.svg) [![NPM Package](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/bizcharts.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/bizcharts) [![NPM Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/bizcharts.svg)](https://npmjs.org/package/bizcharts) New charting and visualization library has been released: http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts. [More details about BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/index) ## Features - React es6 grammar - Easy to use - Strong expansion capability - Support most data visualization charts [see more demos](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/demo) ## Releases - v3.5.x: https://bizcharts.net/product/bizcharts/gallery - V4.0.0: https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/gallery 升级文档： https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/category/61/page/104 ## Installation ### npm ```sh $ npm install bizcharts ``` ### umd ```html ``` ### dev build ```sh $ git clone https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts.git $ cd BizCharts $ npm install $ npm start $ npm run build ``` ### test snapshot 不支持外网测试 ``` tnpm run uitest ``` ## Usage [试一试](https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/demo/305) ```jsx import {Chart, Axis, Tooltip, Line, Point} from "bizcharts"; const data = [...]; `${val}°C`}} /> ``` ### [FAQ](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/qa) ### How to Contribute We welcome all contributions. You could submit any ideas as pull requests. Thank you for your interest and have a good time. Please let us know how can we help. Do check out [issues](https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts/issues) for bug reports or suggestions first. #### update: G2 decided to terminate the "Experience Improvement Program". In verson @antv/g2@3.4.7（released at 2018.12.26） and above, all tracking code is removed, no unexpected remote request will be sent while you are using G2. And Bizcharts Upgrade the dependent version the first time at 2018.12.26 24:00. ### License BizCharts is available under the License MIT.

[More details about BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/index) ## Features - React es6 grammar - Easy to use - Strong expansion capability - Support most data visualization charts [see more demos](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/demo) ## Releases - v3.5.x: https://bizcharts.net/product/bizcharts/gallery - V4.0.0: https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/gallery 升级文档： https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/category/61/page/104 ## Installation ### npm ```sh $ npm install bizcharts ``` ### umd ```html ``` ### dev build ```sh $ git clone https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts.git $ cd BizCharts $ npm install $ npm start $ npm run build ``` ### test snapshot 不支持外网测试 ``` tnpm run uitest ``` ## Usage [试一试](https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/demo/305) ```jsx import {Chart, Axis, Tooltip, Line, Point} from "bizcharts"; const data = [...]; `${val}°C`}} /> ``` ### [FAQ](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/qa) ### How to Contribute We welcome all contributions. You could submit any ideas as pull requests. Thank you for your interest and have a good time. Please let us know how can we help. Do check out [issues](https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts/issues) for bug reports or suggestions first. #### update: G2 decided to terminate the "Experience Improvement Program". In verson @antv/g2@3.4.7（released at 2018.12.26） and above, all tracking code is removed, no unexpected remote request will be sent while you are using G2. And Bizcharts Upgrade the dependent version the first time at 2018.12.26 24:00. ### License BizCharts is available under the License MIT.

4.0.16-beta.0.readme: # BizCharts [![](https://img.shields.io/travis/alibaba/BiaCharts.svg)](https://travis-ci.com/alibaba/BizCharts) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/language-react-red.svg) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-000000.svg) [![NPM Package](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/bizcharts.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/bizcharts) [![NPM Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/bizcharts.svg)](https://npmjs.org/package/bizcharts) New charting and visualization library has been released: http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts. [More details about BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/index) ## Features - React ES6 grammar - Easy to use - Strong expansion capability - Support most data visualization charts [See more demos.](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/demo) ## Releases - v3.5.x: https://bizcharts.net/product/bizcharts/gallery - V4.0.0: https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/gallery Upgrade document: https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/category/61/page/104 ## Installation ### npm ```sh $ npm install bizcharts ``` ### umd ```html ``` ### Dev build ```sh $ git clone https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts.git $ cd BizCharts $ npm install $ npm start $ npm run build ``` ### Test snapshot Does not support external network testing right now. ``` tnpm run uitest ``` ## Usage [Try it out](https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/demo/305) ```jsx import {Chart, Axis, Tooltip, Line, Point} from "bizcharts"; const data = [...]; `${val}°C`}} /> ``` ### [FAQ](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/qa) ### How to Contribute We welcome all contributions. You could submit any ideas as pull requests. Thank you for your interest and have a good time. Please let us know how can we help. Do check out [issues](https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts/issues) for bug reports or suggestions first. #### Update G2 decided to terminate the "Experience Improvement Program". In verson `@antv/g2@3.4.7`（released at 2018.12.26） and above, all tracking code is removed, no unexpected remote request will be sent while you are using G2. And Bizcharts Upgrade the dependent version the first time at 2018.12.26 24:00. ### License BizCharts is available under the License MIT.

4.1.0-beta.1.readme: # BizCharts [![](https://img.shields.io/travis/alibaba/BiaCharts.svg)](https://travis-ci.com/alibaba/BizCharts) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/language-react-red.svg) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-000000.svg) [![NPM Package](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/bizcharts.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/bizcharts) [![NPM Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/bizcharts.svg)](https://npmjs.org/package/bizcharts) New charting and visualization library has been released: http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts. [More details about BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/index) ## Features - React ES6 grammar - Easy to use - Strong expansion capability - Support most data visualization charts [See more demos.](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/demo) ## Releases - v3.5.x: https://bizcharts.net/product/bizcharts/gallery - V4.0.0: https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/gallery Upgrade document: https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/category/61/page/104 ## Installation ### npm ```sh $ npm install bizcharts ``` ### umd ```html ``` ### Dev build ```sh $ git clone https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts.git $ cd BizCharts $ npm install $ npm start $ npm run build ``` ### Test snapshot Does not support external network testing right now. ``` tnpm run uitest ``` ## Usage [Try it out](https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/demo/305) ```jsx import {Chart, Axis, Tooltip, Line, Point} from "bizcharts"; const data = [...]; `${val}°C`}} /> ``` ### [FAQ](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/qa) ### How to Contribute We welcome all contributions. You could submit any ideas as pull requests. Thank you for your interest and have a good time. Please let us know how can we help. Do check out [issues](https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts/issues) for bug reports or suggestions first. #### Update G2 decided to terminate the "Experience Improvement Program". In verson `@antv/g2@3.4.7`（released at 2018.12.26） and above, all tracking code is removed, no unexpected remote request will be sent while you are using G2. And Bizcharts Upgrade the dependent version the first time at 2018.12.26 24:00. ### License BizCharts is available under the License MIT.

4.1.1-beta.0.name: bizcharts
4.1.1-beta.0.readme: # BizCharts [![](https://img.shields.io/travis/alibaba/BiaCharts.svg)](https://travis-ci.com/alibaba/BizCharts) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/language-react-red.svg) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-000000.svg) [![NPM Package](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/bizcharts.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/bizcharts) [![NPM Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/bizcharts.svg)](https://npmjs.org/package/bizcharts) New charting and visualization library has been released: http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts. [More details about BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/index) ## Features - React ES6 grammar - Easy to use - Strong expansion capability - Support most data visualization charts [See more demos.](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/demo) ## Releases - v3.5.x: https://bizcharts.net/product/bizcharts/gallery - V4.0.0: https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/gallery Upgrade document: https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/category/61/page/104 ## Installation ### npm ```sh $ npm install bizcharts ``` ### umd ```html ``` ### Dev build ```sh $ git clone https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts.git $ cd BizCharts $ npm install $ npm start $ npm run build ``` ### Test snapshot Does not support external network testing right now. ``` tnpm run uitest ``` ## Usage [Try it out](https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/demo/305) ```jsx import {Chart, Axis, Tooltip, Line, Point} from "bizcharts"; const data = [...]; `${val}°C`}} /> ``` ### [FAQ](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/qa) ### How to Contribute We welcome all contributions. You could submit any ideas as pull requests. Thank you for your interest and have a good time. Please let us know how can we help. Do check out [issues](https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts/issues) for bug reports or suggestions first. #### Update G2 decided to terminate the "Experience Improvement Program". In verson `@antv/g2@3.4.7`（released at 2018.12.26） and above, all tracking code is removed, no unexpected remote request will be sent while you are using G2. And Bizcharts Upgrade the dependent version the first time at 2018.12.26 24:00. ### License BizCharts is available under the License MIT.

[More details about BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/index) ## Features - React ES6 grammar - Easy to use - Strong expansion capability - Support most data visualization charts [See more demos.](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/demo) ## Releases - v3.5.x: https://bizcharts.net/product/bizcharts/gallery - V4.0.0: https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/gallery Upgrade document: https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/category/61/page/104 ## Installation ### npm ```sh $ npm install bizcharts ``` ### umd ```html ``` ### Dev build ```sh $ git clone https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts.git $ cd BizCharts $ npm install $ npm start $ npm run build ``` ### Test snapshot Does not support external network testing right now. ``` tnpm run uitest ``` ## Usage [Try it out](https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/demo/305) ```jsx import {Chart, Axis, Tooltip, Line, Point} from "bizcharts"; const data = [...]; `${val}°C`}} /> ``` ### [FAQ](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/qa) ### How to Contribute We welcome all contributions. You could submit any ideas as pull requests. Thank you for your interest and have a good time. Please let us know how can we help. Do check out [issues](https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts/issues) for bug reports or suggestions first. #### Update G2 decided to terminate the "Experience Improvement Program". In verson `@antv/g2@3.4.7`（released at 2018.12.26） and above, all tracking code is removed, no unexpected remote request will be sent while you are using G2. And Bizcharts Upgrade the dependent version the first time at 2018.12.26 24:00. ### License BizCharts is available under the License MIT.

4.1.5-beta.0.name: bizcharts
4.1.5-beta.0.readme: # BizCharts [![](https://img.shields.io/travis/alibaba/BiaCharts.svg)](https://travis-ci.com/alibaba/BizCharts) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/language-react-red.svg) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-000000.svg) [![NPM Package](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/bizcharts.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/bizcharts) [![NPM Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/bizcharts.svg)](https://npmjs.org/package/bizcharts) New charting and visualization library has been released: http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts. [More details about BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/index) ## Features - React ES6 grammar - Easy to use - Strong expansion capability - Support most data visualization charts [See more demos.](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/demo) ## Releases - v3.5.x: https://bizcharts.net/product/bizcharts/gallery - V4.0.0: https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/gallery Upgrade document: https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/category/61/page/104 ## Installation ### npm ```sh $ npm install bizcharts ``` ### umd ```html ``` ### Dev build ```sh $ git clone https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts.git $ cd BizCharts $ npm install $ npm start $ npm run build ``` ### Test snapshot Does not support external network testing right now. ``` tnpm run uitest ``` ## Usage [Try it out](https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/demo/305) ```jsx import {Chart, Axis, Tooltip, Line, Point} from "bizcharts"; const data = [...]; `${val}°C`}} /> ``` ### [FAQ](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/qa) ### How to Contribute We welcome all contributions. You could submit any ideas as pull requests. Thank you for your interest and have a good time. Please let us know how can we help. Do check out [issues](https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts/issues) for bug reports or suggestions first. #### Update G2 decided to terminate the "Experience Improvement Program". In verson `@antv/g2@3.4.7`（released at 2018.12.26） and above, all tracking code is removed, no unexpected remote request will be sent while you are using G2. And Bizcharts Upgrade the dependent version the first time at 2018.12.26 24:00. ### License BizCharts is available under the License MIT.

4.1.7-beta.0.name: bizcharts
4.1.7-beta.0.readme: # BizCharts [![](https://img.shields.io/travis/alibaba/BiaCharts.svg)](https://travis-ci.com/alibaba/BizCharts) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/language-react-red.svg) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-000000.svg) [![NPM Package](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/bizcharts.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/bizcharts) [![NPM Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/bizcharts.svg)](https://npmjs.org/package/bizcharts) New charting and visualization library has been released: http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts. [More details about BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/index) ## Features - React ES6 grammar - Easy to use - Strong expansion capability - Support most data visualization charts [See more demos.](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/demo) ## Releases - v3.5.x: https://bizcharts.net/product/bizcharts/gallery - V4.0.0: https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/gallery Upgrade document: https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/category/61/page/104 ## Installation ### npm ```sh $ npm install bizcharts ``` ### umd ```html ``` ### Dev build ```sh $ git clone https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts.git $ cd BizCharts $ npm install $ npm start $ npm run build ``` ### Test snapshot Does not support external network testing right now. ``` tnpm run uitest ``` ## Usage [Try it out](https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/demo/305) ```jsx import {Chart, Axis, Tooltip, Line, Point} from "bizcharts"; const data = [...]; `${val}°C`}} /> ``` ### [FAQ](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/qa) ### How to Contribute We welcome all contributions. You could submit any ideas as pull requests. Thank you for your interest and have a good time. Please let us know how can we help. Do check out [issues](https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts/issues) for bug reports or suggestions first. #### Update G2 decided to terminate the "Experience Improvement Program". In verson `@antv/g2@3.4.7`（released at 2018.12.26） and above, all tracking code is removed, no unexpected remote request will be sent while you are using G2. And Bizcharts Upgrade the dependent version the first time at 2018.12.26 24:00. ### License BizCharts is available under the License MIT.

4.1.8-beta.0.readme: # BizCharts [![](https://img.shields.io/travis/alibaba/BiaCharts.svg)](https://travis-ci.com/alibaba/BizCharts) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/language-react-red.svg) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-000000.svg) [![NPM Package](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/bizcharts.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/bizcharts) [![NPM Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/bizcharts.svg)](https://npmjs.org/package/bizcharts) New charting and visualization library has been released: http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts. [More details about BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/index) ## Features - React ES6 grammar - Easy to use - Strong expansion capability - Support most data visualization charts [See more demos.](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/demo) ## Releases - v3.5.x: https://bizcharts.net/product/bizcharts/gallery - V4.0.0: https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/gallery Upgrade document: https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/category/61/page/104 ## Installation ### npm ```sh $ npm install bizcharts ``` ### umd ```html ``` ### Dev build ```sh $ git clone https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts.git $ cd BizCharts $ npm install $ npm start $ npm run build ``` ### Test snapshot Does not support external network testing right now. ``` tnpm run uitest ``` ## Usage [Try it out](https://bizcharts.net/product/BizCharts4/demo/305) ```jsx import {Chart, Axis, Tooltip, Line, Point} from "bizcharts"; const data = [...]; `${val}°C`}} /> ``` ### [FAQ](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/qa) ### How to Contribute We welcome all contributions. You could submit any ideas as pull requests. Thank you for your interest and have a good time. Please let us know how can we help. Do check out [issues](https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts/issues) for bug reports or suggestions first. #### Update G2 decided to terminate the "Experience Improvement Program". In verson `@antv/g2@3.4.7`（released at 2018.12.26） and above, all tracking code is removed, no unexpected remote request will be sent while you are using G2. And Bizcharts Upgrade the dependent version the first time at 2018.12.26 24:00. ### License BizCharts is available under the License MIT.

3.5.10.readme: # BizCharts [![](https://img.shields.io/travis/alibaba/BiaCharts.svg)](https://travis-ci.com/alibaba/BizCharts) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/language-react-red.svg) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-000000.svg) [![NPM Package](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/bizcharts.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/bizcharts) [![NPM Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/bizcharts.svg)](https://npmjs.org/package/bizcharts) New charting and visualization library has been released: http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts. Please move to it and we won't maintain the old version soon. [More details about BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/index) ## Features - React es6 grammar - Easy to use - Strong expansion capability - Support most data visualization charts [see more demos](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/demo) ## Installation ### npm ```sh $ npm install bizcharts ``` ### umd ```html ``` ### dev build ```sh $ git clone https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts.git $ cd BizCharts $ npm install $ npm run build ``` ### dev demo ```sh $ sudo vi /etc/hosts // add 127.0.0.1 localhost $ npm run[-script] demo // open in browser http://localhost:3510/ ``` ## Usage ```jsx import {Chart, Axis, Tooltip, Geom} from "bizcharts"; const data = [...]; `${val}°C`}} /> ``` ## Document ### tutorial - [quick start](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/start) - [chart introduce](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/chart) - [chart type](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/chartType) - [data](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/data) - [DataSet](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/dataset) - [dataflow](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/dataflow) - [theme](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/theme) - [interaction](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/interaction) - [animation](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/animate) ### api - [BizCharts](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/bizcharts) - components - [Chart](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/chart) - [Coord](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/coord) - [Axis](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/axis) - [Geom](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/geom) - [Label](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/label) - [Legend](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/legend) - [Tooltip](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/tooltip) - [Guide](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/guide) - [Facet](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/facet) - [View](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/view) - Plugin - [Slider](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/sliderPlugin) - others - [scale](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/scale) - [shape](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/shape) - [dataset](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/dataset) - [connector](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/connector) - [transform](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/transform) - [theme](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/api/theme) ### [FAQ](http://bizcharts.net/products/bizCharts/docs/qa) ### How to Contribute We welcome all contributions. You could submit any ideas as pull requests. Thank you for your interest and have a good time. Please let us know how can we help. Do check out [issues](https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts/issues) for bug reports or suggestions first. ### Experience improvement plan description ~~In order to better service to users, and G2 will monitoring, such as URL information is sent back to AntV server, BizCharts did not close the request: https://kcart.alipay.com/web/bi.do~~ ~~No other information is collected except the URL and G2 version information, all in order to have a better understanding of how G2 works and better serve users. If you are worried, you can close it by the following code:~~ ``` // close G2 experience improvement plan dot request (such as server-side rendering) BizCharts.Track (false); ``` #### update: G2 decided to terminate the "Experience Improvement Program". In verson @antv/g2@3.4.7（released at 2018.12.26） and above, all tracking code is removed, no unexpected remote request will be sent while you are using G2. And Bizcharts Upgrade the dependent version the first time at 2018.12.26 24:00. ### License BizCharts is available under the License MIT.

readme: # BizCharts [![](https://img.shields.io/travis/alibaba/BiaCharts.svg)](https://travis-ci.com/alibaba/BizCharts) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/language-react-red.svg) ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-000000.svg) [![NPM Package](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/bizcharts.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/bizcharts) [![NPM Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/bizcharts.svg)](https://npmjs.org/package/bizcharts) New charting and visualization library has been released: https://bizcharts.taobao.com/products/bizCharts. [More details about BizCharts](https://bizcharts.taobao.com/index) ## Features - React ES6 grammar - Easy to use - Strong expansion capability - Support most data visualization charts [See more demos.](https://bizcharts.taobao.com/products/bizCharts/demo) ## Releases - v3.5.x: https://bizcharts.taobao.com/product/bizcharts/gallery - V4.0.0: https://bizcharts.taobao.com/product/BizCharts4/gallery Upgrade document: https://bizcharts.taobao.com/product/BizCharts4/category/61/page/104 ## Installation ### npm ```sh $ npm install bizcharts ``` ### umd ```html ``` ### Dev build ```sh $ git clone https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts.git $ cd BizCharts $ npm install $ npm start $ npm run build ``` ### Test snapshot Does not support external network testing right now. ``` tnpm run uitest ``` ## Usage [Try it out](https://bizcharts.taobao.com/product/BizCharts4/demo/305) ```jsx import {Chart, Axis, Tooltip, Line, Point} from "bizcharts"; const data = [...]; `${val}°C`}} /> ``` ### [FAQ](https://bizcharts.taobao.com/products/bizCharts/docs/qa) ### How to Contribute We welcome all contributions. You could submit any ideas as pull requests. Thank you for your interest and have a good time. Please let us know how can we help. Do check out [issues](https://github.com/alibaba/BizCharts/issues) for bug reports or suggestions first. #### Update G2 decided to terminate the "Experience Improvement Program". In version `@antv/g2@3.4.7`（released at 2018.12.26）and above, all tracking code is removed, no unexpected remote request will be sent while you are using G2. And Bizcharts Upgrade the dependent version the first time at 2018.12.26 24:00. ### License BizCharts is available under the License MIT.
